verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>: and all that is <S%H7130>within<s%> me, bless his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>.
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H7911>forget<s%> not all his <S%H1576>benefits<s%>:
Who <S%H5545>forgiveth<s%> all thine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>; who <S%H7495>healeth<s%> all thy <S%H8463>diseases<s%>;
Who <S%H1350>redeemeth<s%> thy <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H7845>destruction<s%>; who <S%H5849>crowneth<s%> thee with <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%>;
Who <S%H7646>satisfieth<s%> thy <S%H5716>mouth<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%> things; so that thy <S%H5271>youth<s%> is <S%H2318>renewed<s%> like the <S%H5404>eagle's<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>executeth<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> for all that are <S%H6231>oppressed<s%>.
He made <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, his <S%H5949>acts<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7349>merciful<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious<s%>, <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%>, and <S%H7227>plenteous<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy<s%>.
He will not <S%H5331>always<s%> <S%H7378>chide<s%>: neither will he <S%H5201>keep<s%> his anger for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
He hath not <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with us after our <S%H2399>sins<s%>; nor <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> us according to our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.
For as the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is high <S%H1361>above<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, so <S%H1396>great<s%> is his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> toward them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him.
As far <S%H7368>as<s%> the <S%H4217>east<s%> is from the <S%H4628>west<s%>, so far hath he <S%H7368>removed<s%> our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> from us.
Like as a <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7355>pitieth<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%>, so the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7355>pitieth<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him.
For he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> our <S%H3336>frame<s%>; he <S%H2142>remembereth<s%> that we are <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
As for <S%H582>man<s%>, his <S%H3117>days<s%> are as <S%H2682>grass<s%>: as a <S%H6731>flower<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, so he <S%H6692>flourisheth<s%>.
For the <S%H7307>wind<s%> passeth <S%H5674>over<s%> it, and it is gone; and the <S%H4725>place<s%> thereof shall <S%H5234>know<s%> it no more.

But the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> upon them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him, and his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> unto <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>;
To such as <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and to those that <S%H2142>remember<s%> his <S%H6490>commandments<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3559>prepared<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; and his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> <S%H4910>ruleth<s%> over all.

<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, ye his <S%H4397>angels<s%>, that <S%H1368>excel<s%> in <S%H3581>strength<s%>, that <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H1697>commandments<s%>, <S%H8085>hearkening<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>word<s%>.
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> ye the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, all ye his <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; ye <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of his, that <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H7522>pleasure<s%>.
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, all his <S%H4639>works<s%> in all <S%H4725>places<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion<s%>: <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
